features: 【Stepless Dimming and Sensitive Button Control】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 10 brightness dimming levels. So there are 30 lighting modes to meet all your requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by a button switch, which is more durable than the touch-sensitive desk lamps.

【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 64 lamp beads, it has uniform brightness, no glare, no ghosts, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, work, study. The office lamp is a best gift for kids & bookworms. This study lamp with memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used.

【Space Saving and Flexible Gooseneck】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop up to 2 inches. It holds the swing arm lamp securely in place. The clamp lamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching the table. Table light with a flexible gooseneck, which can be adjusted 360°to provide multi-directional lighting. The foldable gooseneck lamp is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp.

【USB Powered and Customer Service】The reading lamp is powered by the USB cable. You could supply the power to the led table lamp through adapters (5V/2A), power banks, computers, and other ways. The usb cable length is 118inch, which is suitable for daily use, no more worry about the distance between the clamp lamp and socket. We provide quality product and customer service.
【What You Get】Yotutun LED Desk Lamp, english manual, 5V 2A power plug， metal clamp, lifetime warranty and within 24 hours customer support reply.
body.description: Ideal desk light for work and life 64 High-Quality LED Bulbs (32 warm light & 32 cold light ), which can provide larger lighting coverage and give you more comfortable reading or working experience. Highly efficient LED provide 12W enough brightness. Compared with incandescent lamps, its energy consumption is reduced by 80% and saving electricity bills. Led clamp light is more energy-efficient and has a longer service life. It reduces electricity cost and carbon footprint. Light Source:64 LED beads Color Temperature: 3000-6000 K Watts: 12W Lumes:1100LM LED Lifespan: 50,000 hours Operating Voltage: DC 5 V / 2 A Weight: 1.7 pounds Material:Metal + Aluminum

Meanwhile Yotutun offers considerate after service to our valued customers. We are confident to give you the best shopping experience, so please do not miss any warm and high-quality products. Yotutun Gooseneck Lamp with Clamp, Eye-Caring Dimmable Architect Desk Lamp for Home Office Office light has 3 color modes, which is warm light, warm white light and white light.Swing arm desk lamp offers 10 brightness levels under each color mode, CRI is more than 90 (max100).Art desk light with a 360° adjustable gooseneck, which can allows you to easily adjust the light direction.Arm light with foldable design is convenient to carry and save space.The adjustable desk lamp has uniform lighting, which can prevent blue light damage to the eyes.Architect lamp has a memory function, which will remember your brightness setting when turn off the light.Extra wide metal clamp comes with silicone pads, which can support up to 2 inches table top.Attached clamp mounts easily to office tables, computer desks, headboards, drawing board, makeup table, etc.Clamp led light can get power suppply through adapters (5V/2A), power banks, laptop and computers with USB A ports. Please note: Our clamp light has a retractable, shrunken product size: 13.77inch*5.11inch*1.18inch. Please confirm the product size before you buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is everything my day isn't! It's long, flexible, and bright! Material is a soft plastic and is light weight. The clamp attached easily and tightly to my desk. Very sturdy even when bending and moving the lamp. And it bends easily. The slim design leaves plenty of space on my desk for work. And the pink adds the pop of color I love! I generally keep it on bright white although the soft yellow was great for a night light when my daughter fell asleep in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and long
reviews.reviewText: Works great with my sewing machine. Easy to attach and remove from multiple work surfaces. The length keeps it out of my way while still providing ample light for sewing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Desk Lamp for Me
reviews.reviewText: I need a desk lamp for 2 purposes. First, I need some warm light at the back of my monitor in order to reduce eye strain at night. Second, I need a desk lamp for reading and writing. Since this lamp has a goose neck, I can bend it to satisfy both needs with ease. The light from the lamp has 3 temperature settings, this is important because you should only use warm light at night in order not to disrupt your sleep.As you can see from the picture of my watt meter, the lamp consumed 11.3 watts at full power with a 2A power adapter, this was very close to its stated rating of 12 watts. When I tested the lamp with a 1A power adapter, it still worked, but it only drew about 7.6 watts. This means that you get a brightness level of about level 7. In practice, this should not be a problem, since you don't really want to run the lamp constantly at level 10 anyway. This is because LEDs tend to deteriorate faster at high temperature. I intend to run my lamp at about level 5 most of the time, so even a 1A power adapter will do.The build quality of this lamp is very good.Incidentally, the lamp does not come with a power adapter, but you can get a 2A adapter from Amazon for about 4 dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing lamp, odd yellow discoloration?
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is my favorite lamp I’ve ever had. Easy to assemble, wide range of brightness and light temperature. Very adjustable and takes up next to no desk space. It’s the perfect lamp for any artist that needs to be able to see how color will behave in different settings. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars and not 5 is because my lamp came with some odd yellow discoloration on the remote. I haven’t seen any other reviews with this issue so I think mine was just a fluke. The yellow can sometimes happen on apple products in the same way if exposed to sunlight so it’s no deal breaker for me.👍 overall I highly recommend this light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing light for nail techs
reviews.reviewText: I am a home based nail artist and this lamp saved my life, it’s super bright and can be adjusted, and it’s also very flexible and sturdy. It has 3 modes which I love for pictures. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality flexible lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I really like the one-piece sturdy metal clamp and the long flexible neck. The neck is covered in smooth rubber. The on/off control switch is easy to use. This is a great desk lamp!

reviews.reviewerName: Lo amo es un 10 . Me encanto .
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Es muy bonita y su luz es muy buena me encanta 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars versitile minimalist lamp, mysterious power supply situation.
reviews.reviewText: This is the exact lamp I need for attaching to the desk below my loft bed. I set it up behind my computer to as a webcam light source that effectively bounces off the bottom of my bed. It's fantastic for this situation and takes up very little space. The lamp itself is terrific, light is nice, the look is nice.A few issues that I hope I can overlook, but have been confusing:1) this lamp would be 1000% awesome if it came with a suitable power supply. It doesn't. And the literature is contradictary. I went online to re-learn the electrical skills I needed to discern what power supply was actually needed...but again, the literature leaves a lot of guessing. Generally, a 12W appliance would most likely require 2.4A 5V power supply. This is what I'm using, and it appears to do the job. However—the product description here says it's a 12 watt lamp, but the insert that came with the lamp says it's rated for only 10 watts. So who knows? I've read in the product description here that it needs a 2Amp power supply, and the insert that came with the lamp says it needs a 3Amp power supply. I hope I got it right, but there's not an immediate way for me to know given the lack of clarity.2) The lamp head gets quite hot quite quickly. It also cools off quite quickly when powered down.3) the clamp that attaches to the table is sturdy and good, but is not lined with silicone as the product description says, it's lined with foam on one side of the clamp. good enough for me, but I wish the provided info was accurate.I'll update here if any issues arise.

Purchased one and loved it very much for my applications. Got one to try and it was so good. I bought another. One for scale modeling and other for stamp colleting. Great flexibility. Excellent lighting. Great length

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light is making just enough light for my needs , arm is incredibly massive , but still look pretty nice

reviews.reviewTitle: Well built but has warranty issue
reviews.reviewText: Good product overall. But warranty could not be activated using the QR code. As such, the product is not covered by warranty. Have reached out to the Amazon, hope they can rectify.

Like the shape of the light, how the arm curves. The length of the arm. Love the choice of three different light shade and also that you can adjust the intensity Also live the fact that it can either be plug in my computer or an electrical socket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best purchases of the year
reviews.reviewText: I needed a desk lamp that was flexible in an unorthodox position on my desk. This work perfectlyThe option to change the lamp colour and brightness is also great as the seasons changeI have had other members of my family also order it after being impressed by the product
